articles.author: Sinéad Carew, Shristi A
articles.title: Wall Street barely gains as traders digest earlier gains, Fed comments - Reuters
articles.description: Wall Street's three major indexes edged up slightly on Friday as investors digested recent gains while remarks from Federal Reserve officials clouded the outlook about when the U.S. central bank might start cutting interest rates.
